Entity.Name: MeasResult
Entity.Title: Measurement Result
Entity.Desc: The measurement result from SDRN Server

Field.Name: Id
Field.Desc: The SDRN ID of the measurement result.
Field.Title: Id record

Field.Name: StatusCode
Field.Desc: The code of the status of the data import
Field.Title: Status code

Field.Name: StatusName
Field.Desc: The name of the status of the data import
Field.Title: Status name

Field.Name: StatusNote
Field.Desc: The note of the status of the data import
Field.Title: Status note

Field.Name: CreatedDate
Field.Desc: The date of the record created
Field.Title: Created date

Field.Name: MeasTime
Field.Desc: The date of the measurement result
Field.Title: Measurement date
